General.Name: Hg Technologies Co Ltd
General.Description: HG Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of electrostatic imaging consumables and imaging equipment for printing and copying. It offers toner, OPC drum, information security copier, and special precision processing products. The company is based in Handan, China.

2.Name: Mr. Qi Lin  Shen
2.Title: Sec. of Board of Directors & Deputy GM
